title: Reflections on Macroeconomics Then and Now
content: - 17 -   some stage of your career; but never forget that identifying what is happening in the   economy is essential to your ability to do your job, and for that you need to keep your   eyes, your ears, and your mind open, and with regard to your mouth--to use it with   caution.     Many thanks again for this award and this opportunity to speak with you.
